original_text: God knows what each person has done, and he judges each one for those things. He is always fair when he decides about people. He is never kinder to one person than he is to another person. When you pray to God, you call him ‘Father’. So then, always respect him, while you live as strangers here in the world.
korean_text: 외모로 보시지 않고 각 사람의 행위대로 심판하시는 이를 너희가 아버지라 부른즉 너희가 나그네로 있을 때를 두려움으로 지내라

sentences.original_text: God knows what each person has done
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님은 각 사람이 무엇을 했는지 아신다

sentences.original_text: and he judges each one for those things
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 그것들 때문에 각 사람을 심판하신다

sentences.original_text: He is always fair when he decides about people
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 사람들에 대해 결정하실 때 항상 공정하시다

sentences.original_text: He is never kinder to one person than he is to another person
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 한 사람에게 다른 사람보다 더 친절하신 적이 없다

sentences.original_text: while you live as strangers here in the world
